scene_description_enriched: A bishop, identifiable by his mitre and crozier, stands in a landscape. He wears a blue robe adorned with gold floral motifs and a golden cope. His left hand is raised in a gesture of blessing or teaching, while his right hand holds the crozier. The background features rolling green hills and a lush green tree with gold accents, suggesting a natural, outdoor setting. The figure is depicted with a halo, indicating his saintly status.
